# Ethereum kv-store deployment prepare
At first, need to do these following three steps to deploy a smart contract
##
```````
# get ethereum account
curl localhost:8051 -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_accounts","params":[],"id":1}'

# deploy the kvstore smart contract
curl localhost:8051  -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_sendTransaction","params":[{"from": "0x4596d8ec539b21635a10a577754a521395ebeeb9", "to":null,"data": ""}],"id":1}'

curl localhost:8051  -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_sendTransaction","params": [{ "gas": "0x100000","gasPrice": "0x0","from": "0x4596d8ec539b21635a10a577754a521395ebeeb9","data": ""}],"id":1}'

# get receipt (smart contract address)
curl localhost:8051 -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0xd37b952ebbb1186805682c74ace31e6c32ebe3e9c8a674ce2db67a6e569d5cea"],"id":1}'
```````
In the first step, get a account address. This address need to put in the "from" field in second step.
The second step is to deploy / activate a smart contract.
In the third step we get the smart contract account address.
